Welcome to Ontotext&trade; presentations! 
This site contains the updatable index of public presentations Ontotext employees gave in frame of various research projects, tutorial sessions at conferences, internal trainings. 
The slides are prepared with the help of [Quarto publishing system](https://quarto.org) enriched with [RevealJS presentation framework](https://revealjs.com/).
